func_sig.description: Calculates the volume of a cone given its radius and height.
func_sig.name: calculate_volume_of_cone

radius.description: The radius of the base of the cone.

func_sig.description: Calculates the area of a circle given its radius.
func_sig.name: calculate_area_of_circle

func_sig.description: Calculate the area of a triangle given its base and height.
func_sig.name: calculate_area_of_triangle

base.description: The length of the base of the triangle.

func_sig.description: Calculate the surface area of a frustum given the radii and height.
func_sig.name: calculate_surface_area_frustum

radius1.description: The radius of the upper base of the frustum.

radius2.description: The radius of the lower base of the frustum.

func_sig.description: Calculate the surface area of a cube given its edge length.
func_sig.name: calculate_surface_area_of_cube

edge_length.description: The length of one edge of the cube.

func_sig.description: Calculate the area of a frustum of a cone given the radii of the two bases and the height.
func_sig.name: calculate_area_of_frustum

radius1.description: The radius of the upper base of the frustum.

radius2.description: The radius of the lower base of the frustum.
